description:
http://anidb.net/ch86836 [Usami Ichika] is a second year middle school student who works in her family`s cafe, Kirakira Patisserie. One day, she meets a spoiled lamb fairy named http://anidb.net/ch86846 [Pekorin] who tells her evil monsters known as Henteko have been stealing "Kirakiraru", the energy that resides within sweets and desserts. Ichika then becomes a pretty cure and, with four other girls, they form the kirakira precure a la mode to fight the henteko and protect the sweets.
Source: Wikipedia

REGULAR.description:
When Usami Ichika tries to bake a cake for her mother, she`s visited by a helpful fairy and a troublemaking monster! To save her cake, she must transform into the legendary pâtissier, Cure Whip!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Daisuki Tappuri! Cure Whip Dekiagari!
Lots of Love! Cure Whip, Ready to Serve!
大好きたっぷり! キュアホイップできあがり!

REGULAR.description:
Ichika bonds with shy Arisugawa Himari over a mutual love of purin. Though Arisugawa fears her passion for sweets might scare her new friend away, it comes in handy when she transforms into Cure Custard!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chiisana Tensai: Cure Custard!
The Tiny Genius Cure Custard!
小さな天才 キュアカスタード!

REGULAR.description:
Ichika and Himari are head-over-heels for the hardcore rocker, Tategami Aoi. But when a monster tries to interrupt her concert, Aoi transforms into the electric Cure Gelato!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sakebe Lion! Cure Gelato!
The Lion`s Roar! Cure Gelato!
叫べライオン! キュアジェラート!

REGULAR.description:
The three new best friends decide to bake an extra-special treat for their favorite ballerina. But is the recipe for cream puffs biting off more than they can chew?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 3 Nin Sorotte Let`s La Mazemaze!
3人そろってレッツ・ラ・まぜまぜ!
The Three Assembled Let`s La Mix It Up!

REGULAR.description:
Kotozume Yukari is the most beautiful girl in her school, exceptionally talented... and bored with everything. But when she finds herself taking a liking to Ichika, she winds up as her newest ally, Cure Macaron!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kimagure Onee-sama wa Cure Macaron!
That Fickle Big Sister Is Cure Macaron!
気まぐれお姉さまはキュアマカロン!

REGULAR.description:
When kind and dreamy Kenjo Akira moves in next door, Ichika starts to feel things she`s never felt before... but after making chocolate together, she`s shocked to see her new crush transform into Cure Chocolat!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Could This Be Love!? The Gorgeous Cure Chocolat!
Korette Love!? Kareinaru Cure Chocola!
これってラブ!? 華麗なるキュアショコラ!

REGULAR.description:
Reminiscing about her missing fairy friends has Pekorin feeling blue. To cheer her up, Ichika proposes a donut party on the mountain!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Pekorin Makes Donuts~ Peko!
Pekorin, Donuts Tsukuru Pekoo!
ペコリン, ドーナツ作るペコ~!

REGULAR.description:
Ichika wants her friends to open their own pâtisserie! But as they assign roles and get to work, nothing seems to go right...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kira Party Open... Dekimasen!
KiraPati`s Grand Opening! ... Isn`t Going to Happen?!
キラパティオープン... できません!

REGULAR.description:
The KiraPâti is open for business... but nobody`s coming! Will baking cookies for a lovelorn young man help to turn their luck around?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kira Party ga Anata no Koi, Kanaemasu!
KiraPati Will Grant You Your Love!
キラパティがあなたの恋, 叶えます!

REGULAR.description:
Akira and Yukari are the stars of the KiraPâti, but when Ichika sends them out to buy toppings for the perfect fruit tart, their natural differences assert themselves.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Yukari tai Akira! Arashi o Yobu Otsukai!
Yukari vs. Akira! The Stormy Shopping Trip!
ゆかりVS[たい]あきら! 嵐を呼ぶおつかい!

REGULAR.description:
The KiraPâti has a booth in the town`s sweets festival! But Gummy and his gang are back, and they`re hungry... for the town`s entire supply of kirakiral!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kessen! Precure tai Gummy Shuudan!
Showdown! Pretty Cure vs. Team Gummy!
決戦! プリキュアVS[たい]ガミー集団!

REGULAR.description:
A cool and mysterious transfer student, Kuroki Rio, arrives at Ichika`s school. Meanwhile, a new threat arrives to challenge the Precures: the sinister masked Julio!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Our Enemy Is... the Popular Transfer Student!?
Teki wa... Motemote Tenkousei!?
敵は... モテモテ転校生!?

REGULAR.description:
The local greengrocer thinks Himari is the perfect person to do PR for Ichigozaka Shopping Street! But will her fear of sharing her passion hold her back from it?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Muri Muri! Himari, Masaka no Debut!
No Way, No Way! Himari`s Unexpected Debut!
ムリムリ! ひまり, まさかのデビュー!

REGULAR.description:
Aoi is snatched away in the middle of a concert... by her family butler?! Rock `n` roll is Aoi`s only outlet from her restrictive upbringing, and if Ichika can`t help, she might lose it forever!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Little Princess Rock & Roll!
Ojou-sama Rock `n` Roll!
お嬢さまロックンロール!

REGULAR.description:
Akira`s sister Miku gets a reprieve from the hospital to visit the KiraPâti! While Akira frets about Miku`s health, Miku seems desperate to find a way to show her appreciation for Akira.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ai Yue ni! Ikari no Cure Chocola!
All for Love! The Fury of Cure Chocolat!
愛ゆえに! 怒りのキュアショコラ!

REGULAR.description:
Yukari invites the girls to a tea ceremony at her traditional home... and sets a trap for Julio!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Collision Course! Yukari and Rio!
Kiken na Kyuusekkin! Yukari to Rio
キケンな急接近! ゆかりとリオ

REGULAR.description:
Julio sets his manipulative sights on the leader of the Precures: Cure Whip! Can Ichika`s love for her mother win the day?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Saigo no Jikken! Henshin Dekinai Cure Whip
The Final Experiment! Cure Whip Can`t Transform!
最後の実験! 変身できないキュアホイップ!

REGULAR.description:
While the Precure girls struggle with a nasty rumor about their shop, Master Noir sends a new envoy to rustle up kirakiral in Ichigozaka: the cynical trickster Bibli!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Rumours of a Dangerous Enemy: Bibury!
Uwasa no Nushi wa Kyouteki Biburii!
ウワサの主は強敵ビブリー!

REGULAR.description:
Parisian sweets prodigy Kirahoshi Ciel arrives in Ichigozaka, and Ichika is determined to become her disciple!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tensai Patissier! Kirahoshi Ciel!
The Patissiere Prodigy! Kirahoshi Ciel!
天才パティシエ! キラ星シエル!

REGULAR.description:
Ciel decides to give Ichika a lesson in fine ingredients with a trip through the mountains. But a sweet visit to a honey farm is interrupted by a Bibli attack!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Akogare Mazemaze! Ichika to Ciel!
Mix Up Your Admiration! Ichika and Ciel!
憧れまぜまぜ! いちかとシエル!

REGULAR.description:
The fairies have returned to Mt. Ichigo! Ichika and the others head there to celebrate, but... wait, why is Ciel there, too?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nandesuto!? Akasareru Ciel no Shoutai!
Wait, What?! Ciel`s True Form Revealed!
なんですと~!? 明かされるシエルの正体!

REGULAR.description:
When Julio returns to vent his hatred on the Precures, Ciel reveals the secret connection they share.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Stop, Julio! The Kirakiraru of Hatred!
Yamete Julio! Nikushimi no Kirakiraru!
やめてジュリオ! 憎しみのキラキラル!

REGULAR.description:
When Ciel tries desperately to make amends with Julio, she`s carried off by Noir... and a new Precure is born!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Soar! The Rainbow Pegasus, Cure Parfait!
Tobe! Niji-iro Pegasus, Cure Parfait!
翔べ! 虹色ペガサス, キュアパルフェ!

REGULAR.description:
Ciel transfers to the girls` school to strengthen their bonds as a team. But the brutish Glaive rolls up in Ichigozaka to steal kirakiral en masse!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tenkousei wa Yousei Kirarin!?
The New Transfer Student Is Kirarin the Fairy!?
転校生は妖精キラリン!?

REGULAR.description:
A visiting prince decides to make Yukari his bride, and Yukari seems to entertain the possibility. Akira`s objections just end up with her wrapped in the affair... as a rival for Yukari`s affections!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dengeki Kekkon!? Princess Yukari!
Instant Marriage!? Princess Yukari!
電撃結婚!? プリンセスゆかり!

REGULAR.description:
An innocent trip to the beach ends up with the KiraPâti girls stranded on a deserted island! In their quest to find enough kirakiral to get home, they run into an old rival who`s just as stuck as they are.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Natsu Da! Umi Da! Kira Party Hyouryuuki!
The Summer! The Ocean! Kira Pati Castaways!
夏だ! 海だ! キラパティ漂流記!

REGULAR.description:
Aoi gets her dream: to appear in a rock festival with her idol, Misaki! But can Aoi sing her heart out when the two are pitted against each other?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Atsuui Live Battle! Aoi vs Misaki!
Super Intense Concert Battle! Aoi vs Misaki!
アツ~いライブバトル! あおいVSミサキ!

REGULAR.description:
A mysterious professor whisks Himari away to be his assistant in creating history`s biggest sponge cake. Will she rise to the challenge, or will her on-stage debut be a flop?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Arise! Himari`s Sweets Experiment!
Fukurame! Himari no Sweets Daijikken!
ふくらめ! ひまりのスイーツ大実験!

REGULAR.description:
Yukari finds herself feeling pensive over her own capricious personality, and the sinister new foe, Elysio, offers her a window into her soul.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Big Trouble! Cure Macaron, Stained in Shadow!
Dai Pinch! Yami ni Somatta Cure Macaron!
大ピンチ! 闇に染まったキュアマカロン!

REGULAR.description:
When Miku joins the KiraPâti girls at the cultural festival at Yukari and Akira`s school, Elysio offers Akira a terrible ultimatum.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nerawareta Gakuensai! Chocola in Wonderland!
The Culture Festival Under Attack! Chocolat in Wonderland!
狙われた学園祭! ショコラ・イン・ワンダーランド!

REGULAR.description:
Ichika struggles to be her usual cheerful self when her mother returns home unexpectedly.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Holding Back the Tears! The Reason for Ichika`s Smile!
Namida wa Gaman! Ichika Egao no Wake!
涙はガマン! いちか笑顔の理由[わけ]!

REGULAR.description:
The girls are sent a hundred years into Ichigozaka`s past, where they witness the extent of Noir`s evil... and meet the Precure of old!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Each of the Shining 6! The Kirakiraru Creamer!
Kiratto Kagayake Muttsu no Kosei! Kirakiraru Creamer!
キラッと輝け6つの個性! キラキラルクリーマー!

REGULAR.description:
Noir`s most loyal servant, Diable, is sowing discord among the citizens of Ichigozaka... and he`s using sweets to do it?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sweets ga Kiken!? Fukkatsu, Yami no Animal!
The Sweets Are the Danger? The Return of Dark Animals!
スイーツがキケン!? 復活, 闇のアニマル!

REGULAR.description:
In circumstances as capricious as she is, Yukari is turned into a cat! Soon, she finds herself caught up in a turf war between the feral cats and fairies of Mt. Ichigozaka!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chiisana Daikettou! Neko Yukari tai Yousei Kirarin!
The Little Big War! Cat-Yukari vs Fairy-Kirarin!
小さな大決闘! ねこゆかりVS[たい]妖精キラリン!

REGULAR.description:
Awkward Himari finds herself questioning her friendship with Aoi while attending a high-society party. But soon, all of the guests are at each other`s throats!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dekoboko Pittari! Himari to Aoi!
Odd Couple, Perfect Match! Himari and Aoi!
デコボコぴったり! ひまりとあおい!

REGULAR.description:
The annual Ichigozaka Games bring out the competitive spirit in everyone, but the athletic Akira is particularly determined to make a good showing for her neighborhood.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ichika and Akira! The Great Strawberry Hill Sports Fest!
Ichika to Akira! Ichigosaka Dai Undoukai!
いちかとあきら! いちご坂大運動会!

REGULAR.description:
Ciel`s sponsor has come all the way from Paris to demand that she return! Can the girls convince the demanding Madame Selene of Ichigozaka`s quiet appeal?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Salut! Ciel, Leaving for France!?
Saryuu! Ciel, France e Saruu!?
サリュー! シエル, フランスへ去るぅー!?

REGULAR.description:
Pekorin wakes up one night... to find out she`s turned into a human?! Proud to finally get to do things she could never do before, she heads out on her first real errand.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Pekorin Ningen ni Nacchatta Pekoo!
Pekorin Turned Into a Human~Peko!
ペコリン人間になっちゃったペコ~!

REGULAR.description:
While the girls try to convince the other fairy tribes to join their fight against Noir, Glaive returns... with his nastiest trick yet!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Noooo! The Precure Against Strawberry Hill!?
Shonna! Precure no Teki wa Ichigosaka!?
しょんな~! プリキュアの敵はいちご坂!?

REGULAR.description:
The Precures` efforts to save the citizens of Ichigozaka continue to fail in the face of Glaive`s darkness. What can possibly save them?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Let`s La Get Changed! Sweets Castle, Ready to Serve!
Let`s La Okigae! Sweets Castle Dekiagari!
レッツ・ラ・おきがえ! スイーツキャッスルできあがり!

REGULAR.description:
A mysterious kirakiral thief terrorizing Ichigozaka turns out to be Elysio`s latest plan to tear Ciel`s family apart.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kira Pika Dreams Forever!
Yume wa Kira Pika Mugendai!
夢はキラ☆ピカ無限大!

REGULAR.description:
Aoi struggles to figure out what to do when Wild Azur`s leader and lyricist reveals that he has to quit the band.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sing It, Wow! Aoi`s Last Song!
Utae Wow! Aoi Last Song!
歌えWOW! あおいラストソング!

REGULAR.description:
Himari decides to test how much she`s changed in the past year by auditioning for a cooking show.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kakushi Aji wa Yuuki Desu! Himari no Mirai Recipe!
The Secret Ingredient Is Courage! Himari`s Recipe of the Future!
かくし味は勇気です! ひまりの未来レシピ!

REGULAR.description:
When Miku goes missing from the hospital, Akira is driven to desperation searching for her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Feelings Hidden in the Snow! Cry Out Your Love, Akira!
Yuki ni Himeta Omoi! Ai o Sakebe, Akira!
雪に秘めた想い! 愛をさけべ, あきら!

REGULAR.description:
Yukari makes a rare suggestion: the KiraPâti should host a Christmas party! But an announcement about her future threatens to bring down the merry mood...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Goodbye, Yukari! Excitement Sweets Christmas!
Sayonara Yukari! Tokimeki Sweets Christmas!
さよならゆかり! トキメキ☆スイーツクリスマス!

REGULAR.description:
With life about to take them in separate directions, the girls decide to hold a birthday party for Ichika.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Noir Dai Kessen! Egao no Kieta Birthday!
Showdown with Noir! The Birthday When Smiles Disappeared!
ノワール大決戦! 笑顔の消えたバースデー!

REGULAR.description:
Elysio`s desire for perfect control locks the Precures in a world without love or hate. The only one who can save them is... Pekorin?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bring Back the Love! Cure Pekorin, Ready to Serve!
Daisuki o Torimodose! Cure Pekorin Dekiagari!
大好きをとりもどせ! キュアペコリンできあがり!

REGULAR.description:
The Precures make one last desperate stand to convince Elysio of the importance of love.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Saigo no Tatakai! Sekai Marugoto Let`s La Mazemaze!
The Final Battle! All Across the World Let`s La Mix It Up!
さいごの戦い! 世界まるごとレッツ・ラ・まぜまぜ!

REGULAR.description:
Before they go their separate ways, the KiraPâti girls face one last threat, with a little help from a mysterious stranger.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Beyond Love! Whip Step Jump!
Daisuki no Saki e! Hoip Step Jump!
大好きの先へ! ホイップ・ステップ・ジャーンプ!
Cure Whip kara Cure Yell e: Baton Touch no Message
From Cure Whip to Cure Yell: Baton Pass Message
キュアホイップからキュアエールへ~バトンタッチのメッセージ~
Cure Whip no Ending Dance Lesson Movie (Normal Tempo)
Cure Whip`s Ending Dance Lesson Movie (Normal Tempo)
キュアホイップのエンディングダンスレッスンムービー (ノーマルテンポ)
Cure Whip no Ending Dance Lesson Movie (Slow Tempo)
Cure Whip`s Ending Dance Lesson Movie (Slow Tempo)
キュアホイップのエンディングダンスレッスンムービー (スローテンポ)
Cure Whip no Kouki Ending Dance Lesson Movie (Normal Tempo)
Cure Whip`s Second Ending Dance Lesson Movie (Normal Tempo)
キュアホイップの後期エンディングダンスレッスンムービー (ノーマルテンポ)

Cure Whip`s Second Ending Dance Lesson Movie (Slow Tempo)
キュアホイップの後期エンディングダンスレッスンムービー (スローテンポ)

Transformation & Attack Scene Collection
変身&技シーン集

Kira Kira Pretty Cure A La Mode
KiraKira☆光之美少女 A La Mode
